charges.charge_disposition: Defendant committed to custody of US Bureau of Prisons for 55 months on each of Counts 1 and 3, to run concurrently with each other. Term consists of 71 months on each count, minus 16 months credit for time served in related state case number 06-CF-64, in the District Court of Canadian County, Oklahoma. In addition to Counts 1 and 3 being concurrent with each other, the federal sentence is also imposed to run concurrently with the imprisonment sentence imposed in Oklahoma. Upon release, defendant shall be on supervised release for 5 years on each of Counts 1 and 3, to run concurrently. Defendant shall pay assessment of $200 and fine of $250 on each of Counts 1 and 3, for a total fine of $500
